scripts.start: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/style.css --watch
scripts.build: set ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true & set NODE_ENV=production & npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -c styles/tailwind.config.js -o dist/style.css --minify & eleventy
